benj 0.0.6
  • Reference

    Run DEGs, switching on the method

    deg.Rd

    Note: It is recommended to save subset information in metadata(se)$subset since there is technically no way to recover that. However, from sample_metadata this should be inferrable.

    deg(
  se,
  pathology,
  case,
  control,
  covariates,
  method,
  output = NULL,
  sample.col = "Sample",
  cpm.cutoff = 10,
  filter_only_case_control = TRUE,
  NRUV = 0,
  min.total.counts.per.sample = 100,
  IQR.factor = 1.5,
  outlier.covariates = c("log1p_total_counts", "n_genes_by_counts", "pct_counts_mt",
    "pct_counts_ribo"),
  verbose = TRUE,
  ensure.integer.counts = TRUE,
  mc.cores = getOption("mc.cores", 12)
)

    Arguments

    se

    SummarizedExperiment object, with integer counts in the "counts" assay.

    pathology

    Column in colData(se) corresponding to diagnosis or experimental condition

    case

    Column in colData(se) corresponding to case values, which must be in "pathology"

    control

    Column in colData(se) corresponding to control values in "pathology"

    covariates

    Covariates to be used. Non-existent variables will be removed, and RUV variables will be added (if NRUV>0).

    method

    Method(s) of DEGs to be used. Valid values are DESeq2, edgerR-GLM, edgeR-QL, nebula, mast-hurdle, mast-random-effect

    output

    Output XLSX

    sample.col

    Sample column in colData(se) corresponding to the experiment. This is the column on which data is pseudobulked.

    cpm.cutoff

    Counts per Million cutoff used for filtering lowly-expressed genes. Genes must be expressed in at least min(case, control) samples at least at this log(CPM) level to be used. This n=min(case, control) is after outlier removal and low-count data.

    filter_only_case_control

    Filter se to only case+control only. Default TRUE

    NRUV

    Number of RUVSeq components to include

    IQR.factor

    Number of IQR factors above 75% percentile to be removed, according to scaled PCA of outlier.covariates. Set to Inf to remove none.

    outlier.covariates

    Sample-level covariates which are scaled and PCA transformed, to get distances from the centroid of the PCA embedding. Outliers above 75% + IQR.factor * IQR are removed.

    Contents

    Developed by Benjamin James.
